title: A History of the World in Six Glasses
overview: Based on the New York Times bestselling book, A History of the World in Six Glasses takes us on a tour around the world to taste the drinks that changed history. Star Dan Aykroyd hosts fellow Saturday Night Live alums Jim Belushi, Jon Lovitz, and Kevin Nealon along with Cheers stalwart George Wendt as they discuss beer, wine, coffee, tea, soda, and spirits.
